name: Marshal Data Migration Model File
summary: Learn about .MARSHAL files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: The Marshal Editor installation includes the Marshal SQLUtility, which can connect to any ODBC compliant database. Once connected, the software provides utilities to view the data schema and translate it into another format. MARSHAL files are used to store the work done during this process.
The Marshal SQLUtility is also available as a standalone installation.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
